name: Duplicate Page Post
author: Harpreet Kumar

sections.description:
The Duplicate Page Post plugin allows users to copy or duplicate a post or page with a single click. The duplicated post or page will be saved as a draft.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. See the License URI for details.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/duplicate-page-post directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. There is no additional configuration required. The “Duplicate” link will appear in the post/page list automatically.
sections.faq:
Where does the “Duplicate” link appear?

The “Duplicate” link appears in the post/page list in the WordPress admin area, under the title of each post or page.

What happens when I click the “Duplicate” link?

When you click the “Duplicate” link, the plugin creates a copy of the selected post or page and saves it as a draft. You are then redirected to the edit screen of the new draft post or page.

Can I duplicate custom post types?

Yes, the plugin should work with any custom post type that supports the standard WordPress post actions.

short_description: The Duplicate Page Post plugin allows users to copy or duplicate a post or page with a single click and save as a draft.
